wikipedia_page.main: Adam Brown (born 9 June 1995) is a Scottish footballer who plays for Stenhousemuir as a midfielder. He has also played for Airdrieonians and St Mirren.

response: *Adam Brown (Canadian politician) (1826–1926), Canadian politician and merchant

On 8 June, it was confirmed that Gregg Wylde, Viktor Genev and youngster Adam Brown have now left the club. Along with the other recent departures, it means eleven players have now left the club following relegation.
